Articles.Content: Has anybody been able to get the Thrustmaster T16000M duo to work with KSP? (I can get one stick working no problem, it is the dual-stick setup that is not cooperating)

Unity/ksp sees them as the same stick as they have the same name in Windows with out any software and all sticks/gamepads use the same buttons. For axis run the left stick through thrustmasters virtual software and it will have a new name. You have to do that before you setup or turn on ksp. Then for buttons use the mod Action Group Extended to assign each button. Or if you run modless you can used Voice Commander to assign buttons to keyboard commands.
The problem with the dual stick is that when using TM's virtual controller software, all the axes are split in half in the game with center stick being full deflection.
Well, got it to work by installing vJoy+UJR. Something buggy with the thrustmaster software I guess.
